snippet: The industrial giant said the new company would be more nimble and house developing sectors like renewable generation, energy efficiency and storage.
abstract: General Electric is will create new spinoff company to house developing energy businesses; new firm, called Current, will provide products and services in energy efficiency, renewable generation and storage.
lead_paragraph: The industrial giant said the new company would be more nimble and house developing sectors like renewable generation, energy efficiency and storage.

headline.print_headline: G.E. Is Set to Spin Off a Business for Energy
headline.main: G.E. to Spin Off New Energy Technologies in One Company
